translated: Then, when one perfects the stage of devoted conduct, one passes through a second incalculable eon.

original: de'i 'og tu rab tu dga' ba nas brtsams te byang chub sems dpa'i sa chos kyi sprin gyi bar la so so sor bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gsum gyis byang chub sems dpa' rdzogs par byas nas sangs rgyas kyis kun tu 'od sgrub par byed pa yin
analyzed: de'i 'og tu rab tu dga' ba nas brtsams te byang chub sems dpa'i sa chos kyi sprin gyi bar la so so sor bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gsum gyis byang chub sems dpa' rdzogs par byas nas sangs rgyas kyis kun tu 'od sgrub par byed pa yin
translated: Then, beginning with the Joyous, one perfects the bodhisattva stage of the Cloud of Dharma, and after perfecting the bodhisattva stage in three incalculable eons, one accomplishes the buddha stage of the Luminous.

original: te / de ltar na bskal pa grangs med pa sum cu rtsa gsum gyis sangs rgyas nyid 'thob pa yin no zhes bshad do //
analyzed: te / de ltar na bskal pa grangs med pa sum cu rtsa gsum gyis sangs rgyas nyid 'thob pa yin no zhes bshad do //
translated: Thus, Buddhahood is attained in thirty-three incalculable aeons.

original: ji skad du bshad ba'i mngon par rtogs pa'i bdag nyid can gyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan ba la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyi sa dang po kho na la ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po rtogs so zhes gsungs pa ni
analyzed: ji skad du bshad ba'i mngon par rtogs pa'i bdag nyid can gyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan ba la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyi sa dang po kho na la ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po rtogs so zhes gsungs pa ni
translated: It is said that on the first stage alone, the stage of joy, one realizes many doors of samadhi through the power of samadhi that has as its object the teaching of the perfection of wisdom which has the nature of the realizations as they have been explained.

original: de la sogs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de la sogs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The words “and so on” refer to the other stages.

original: 'dir ting nge 'dzin gyi mngon par bsgrub pa'i thabs kho na ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rnams ma yin te sa bcu pa las rab tu dga' ba'i sa la ting nge 'dzin brgya 'thob pa zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dir ting nge 'dzin gyi mngon par bsgrub pa'i thabs kho na ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rnams ma yin te sa bcu pa las rab tu dga' ba'i sa la ting nge 'dzin brgya 'thob pa zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Here, the means of accomplishing samadhi is called “the door of samadhi,” but it is not the samadhis themselves, because it is said in the Dasabhumika: “On the stage of joy, one obtains a hundred samadhis.”

original: yang na ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin kho na la ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo zhes bya'o //
analyzed: yang na ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin kho na la ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo zhes bya'o //
translated: Or else, the nature of samadhi itself is called “the door of samadhi.”

original: de la brgya smos pa ni nye bar mtshon pa tsam nyid yin no zhes khong du chung bar bya'o //
analyzed: de la brgya smos pa ni nye bar mtshon pa tsam nyid yin no zhes khong du chung bar bya'o //
translated: One should understand that the term hundred is used here merely as a round number.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bshad pa mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi snang ba las chos 'phags kyi le'u zhes bya ste sum cu rtsa gcig pa'o /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bshad pa mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi snang ba las chos 'phags kyi le'u zhes bya ste sum cu rtsa gcig pa'o /
translated: This concludes the thirty-first chapter, on the Subhuti chapter, in this Ornament of the Essence commentary on the Ornament of Clear Realization.

original: // / ting nge 'dzin yang dag pa kho nar rtogs pa rnams kyi bya ba bstan pa'i phyir rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: // / ting nge 'dzin yang dag pa kho nar rtogs pa rnams kyi bya ba bstan pa'i phyir rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
translated: In order to teach the activities of those who have realized the samādhi correctly, the text says, “Subhuti, bodhisattva mahāsattvas who always and at all times…” and so forth.

original: yang gzhan dag gus pa bskyed par bya ba'i phyir yongs su gtad pa'i don du gleng slong bar mdzad pa ni de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: yang gzhan dag gus pa bskyed par bya ba'i phyir yongs su gtad pa'i don du gleng slong bar mdzad pa ni de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: In order to generate respect in others, the text is introduced for the purpose of entrusting it, with the text saying, “Then the Bhagavān said to the venerable Ānanda…” and so forth.

original: rnam grangs 'dis kyang zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir 'phags pa rtag tu du nyid kyi don chen po byed pa yin pa de bas na sngar bshad pa'i rnam grangs 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi 'dis kyang zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rnam grangs 'dis kyang zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir 'phags pa rtag tu du nyid kyi don chen po byed pa yin pa de bas na sngar bshad pa'i rnam grangs 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi 'dis kyang zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: By this enumeration also means that because the noble always performs great benefits, therefore it is not only by the previously explained enumeration, but also by this one.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis zhes bya ba ni phan yon che ba nyid kyis bar chad mang ba yin pa'i phyir glo bur du yi ger bri bar mi nus te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis zhes bya ba ni phan yon che ba nyid kyis bar chad mang ba yin pa'i phyir glo bur du yi ger bri bar mi nus te /
translated: By the empowerment of the Tathagata means that because of the great benefits, there are many obstacles, and therefore it cannot be written down suddenly.

original: des na de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis yin no //🔽de ltar gleng @339a * //
analyzed: des na de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis yin no // de ltar gleng @339a * //
translated: Therefore, it is by the empowerment of the Tathagata.

original: bslang ba mdzad nas yongs su gtad pa ston par mdzad pa ni kun dga' bo de lta bas na zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: bslang ba mdzad nas yongs su gtad pa ston par mdzad pa ni kun dga' bo de lta bas na zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Having thus made the introduction, he shows the entrustment, saying Therefore, Ananda, and so on.

original: rgyu mtshan ci zhig gis 'di yongs su gtad par mdzad pa yin snyam pa'i dogs pa de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes bya bas bsu nas /
analyzed: rgyu mtshan ci zhig gis 'di yongs su gtad par mdzad pa yin snyam pa'i dogs pa de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes bya bas bsu nas /
translated: With the question For what reason is this entrusted? he anticipates the doubt,🔽and answers with Because it is profound, and so on.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: This perfection of wisdom and so on.

original: de nyid gsal bar mdzad pa ni kun dga' bo 'di ji snyam du sems zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de nyid gsal bar mdzad pa ni kun dga' bo 'di ji snyam du sems zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
translated: In order to clarify that very point, he says What do you think, Ananda? and so on.

original: de ltar mdor bsdus ba rgyas par bstan pa la dga' ba'i sems can la phan 'dogs pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la sogs pa chos kyi sku mdzad pa dang bcas pa'i mthar thug ba'i don brgyad po thams cad nyid yang dag par bstan pa yin
analyzed: de ltar mdor bsdus ba rgyas par bstan pa la dga' ba'i sems can la phan 'dogs pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la sogs pa chos kyi sku mdzad pa dang bcas pa'i mthar thug ba'i don brgyad po thams cad nyid yang dag par bstan pa yin
translated: Thus, in order to benefit those beings who delight in a brief teaching, all eight topics are fully taught, up to the ultimate meaning of the dharmakaya with its activities.

original: no // yang na dang por rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la sogs pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gsum ni mngon par mtshon pa'i gnas nyid yin pas mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: no // yang na dang por rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la sogs pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gsum ni mngon par mtshon pa'i gnas nyid yin pas mtshan nyid do //
translated: Or, first, the three knowledges such as the knowledge of all aspects are the characteristics because they are the basis of illustration.

original: de nas dbang du bya ba'i phyir 'dis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gsum bsgom pa la sbyor bas rnam pa thams cad mngon par rdzogs par rtogs pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sbyor pa'o //🔽de nas shin tu goms pas rab tu 'gro ba'i phyir rtse mo'i mngon par rtogs pa ni mkhyen pa nyid gsum gyi rab kyi gnas skabs yin no //
analyzed: de nas dbang du bya ba'i phyir 'dis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gsum bsgom pa la sbyor bas rnam pa thams cad mngon par rdzogs par rtogs pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sbyor pa'o // de nas shin tu goms pas rab tu 'gro ba'i phyir rtse mo'i mngon par rtogs pa ni mkhyen pa nyid gsum gyi rab kyi gnas skabs yin no //
translated: Then, in order to bring it under control, the application to the realization of the three knowledges is the application to omniscience, because it is the realization of all aspects.🔽Then, the peak realization is the state of the best of the three knowledges, because it is the best of the three knowledges through great familiarity.

original: de nas rtogs pa'i dngos po nges par bya ba'i phyir so so ba dang bsdus pa dag tu bsgoms pa'i don gzhung srong bar byed pas mthar gyis pa'i mngon par rtogs pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gsum gyi go rims kyi gnas skabs yin no //
analyzed: de nas rtogs pa'i dngos po nges par bya ba'i phyir so so ba dang bsdus pa dag tu bsgoms pa'i don gzhung srong bar byed pas mthar gyis pa'i mngon par rtogs pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gsum gyi go rims kyi gnas skabs yin no //
translated: Then, the serial realization is the state of the sequence of the three knowledges, because it is the continuation of the meaning of the meditation in the individual and combined practices in order to ascertain the realized object.

original: de nas khyad par du 'gror med pa yang dag par skad cig ma gcig pa'i mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gsum gyi mthar thug pa'i gnas skabs so //
analyzed: de nas khyad par du 'gror med pa yang dag par skad cig ma gcig pa'i mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gsum gyi mthar thug pa'i gnas skabs so //
translated: Then, the unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment in a single moment of true reality, which is not subject to any further distinction, is the stage of the culmination of the three knowledges.

original: de nas de'i 'bras bu yin pas chos kyi sku mdzad pa dang bcas pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gsum gyi rnam par smin pa yin no //
analyzed: de nas de'i 'bras bu yin pas chos kyi sku mdzad pa dang bcas pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gsum gyi rnam par smin pa yin no //
translated: Then, the Dharma Body with its actions, which is the result of that, is the maturation of the three knowledges.

original: de ltar na mdor bsdus pa 'bring du bstan pa la dga' ba la rjes su brtse bas don bsdus pa rnam pa drug po 'dis snga ma bzhin du rgyal ba'i yum 'di bshad par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na mdor bsdus pa 'bring du bstan pa la dga' ba la rjes su brtse bas don bsdus pa rnam pa drug po 'dis snga ma bzhin du rgyal ba'i yum 'di bshad par bya ba yin no //
translated: Thus, out of compassion for those who delight in a medium length summary, this Mother of the Victorious Ones should be explained by this sixfold summary, as before.

original: de skad du yang /
analyzed: de skad du yang /
translated: And it is said:🔽The characteristics, the application of that,

original: mtshan nyid de yi sbyor ba dang // de rab de yi go rims dang // de mtha' de yi @339b rnam smin ni //
analyzed: mtshan nyid de yi sbyor ba dang // de rab de yi go rims dang // de mtha' de yi @339b rnam smin ni //
translated: the culmination of that, the sequence of that,🔽the conclusion of that, and the maturation of that

original: don bsdus gzhan de rnam pa drug / ces gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: don bsdus gzhan de rnam pa drug / ces gsungs pa yin no //
translated: are the other six aspects of the summary.

original: yang na dang por rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gsum gyi ngo bo nyid ni 'jug pa'i spyod yul yin no //
analyzed: yang na dang por rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gsum gyi ngo bo nyid ni 'jug pa'i spyod yul yin no //
translated: Or else, the first is the domain of engagement, which has the nature of the three knowledges.

original: de ji ltar rab tu sbyor zhe na /
analyzed: de ji ltar rab tu sbyor zhe na /
translated: How is it applied?

original: de'i 'og tu rnam pa thams cad mngon par rdzogs par rtogs pa la sogs pa mngon par rtogs pa rnam pa bzhi ni rgyu'i rang bzhin gyi sbyor ba yin no //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu rnam pa thams cad mngon par rdzogs par rtogs pa la sogs pa mngon par rtogs pa rnam pa bzhi ni rgyu'i rang bzhin gyi sbyor ba yin no //
translated: After that, the four realizations, such as the realization of the complete and perfect realization of all aspects, are the application that has the nature of the cause.

original: sbyor ba dang de lta bu dang ldan pa'i yul de'i 'bras bu ci zhig yin zhe na /
analyzed: sbyor ba dang de lta bu dang ldan pa'i yul de'i 'bras bu ci zhig yin zhe na /
translated: What is the result of that application and possessing such an object?

original: de'i 'og tu chos kyi sku phrin las dang bcas pa ni 'bras bu yin te /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu chos kyi sku phrin las dang bcas pa ni 'bras bu yin te /
translated: After that, the dharmakāya together with its activity is the result.

original: de ltar mngon sum du bsdus te mdor bsdus pa la dga' ba'i sems can rnams kyi dbang du mdzad nas de bzhin du yum 'di bshad par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de ltar mngon sum du bsdus te mdor bsdus pa la dga' ba'i sems can rnams kyi dbang du mdzad nas de bzhin du yum 'di bshad par bya ba yin no //
translated: Thus, for those beings who delight in the concise, this mother is to be explained in terms of the direct realization.

original: de skad du yang /
analyzed: de skad du yang /
translated: And it is said:

original: yul ni rnam pa gsum po rgyu //
analyzed: yul ni rnam pa gsum po rgyu //
translated: The object is threefold: the cause,🔽The essence of the four applications, and the result,

original: sbyor ba bzhi yi bdag nyid dang // chos sku phrin las 'bras bu ni //
analyzed: sbyor ba bzhi yi bdag nyid dang // chos sku phrin las 'bras bu ni //
translated: The dharmakāya and its activity.

original: don bsdus gzhan te rnam pa gsum //
analyzed: don bsdus gzhan te rnam pa gsum //
translated: The summary is different, and there are three types.

original: zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: This is what is said.🔽The Bhagavān was pleased and spoke thus, and so on, and:

original: bcom ldan 'das dgyes shing de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang / skyes bu de ni nyer gnas pa //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das dgyes shing de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang / skyes bu de ni nyer gnas pa //
translated: That person is present,

original: tsam gyi yid bzhin nor bu bzhin //
analyzed: tsam gyi yid bzhin nor bu bzhin //
translated: like a wish-fulfilling jewel.

original: rtsig sogs las kyang chos ston pa //
analyzed: rtsig sogs las kyang chos ston pa //
translated: Even from walls and so on, the Dharma is taught.

original: ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'byung //
analyzed: ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'byung //
translated: It arises just as desired.

original: zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis bcom ldan 'das dgyes shing thugs dga' bas gdul bya'i skye bo skal pa dang ldan pa rnams kyis ston pa po nyid du lhag par zhen pas bshad ma thag pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mdo sde rin po che nyid
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis bcom ldan 'das dgyes shing thugs dga' bas gdul bya'i skye bo skal pa dang ldan pa rnams kyis ston pa po nyid du lhag par zhen pas bshad ma thag pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mdo sde rin po che nyid
translated: In this way, the Bhagavān, pleased and delighted, by the fortunate beings to be tamed strongly clinging to the teacher himself, the precious Prajñāpāramitā Sūtra just explained

original: ma lus pa de skad ces bka' stsal pa ste gsungs pa dang ngo //
analyzed: ma lus pa de skad ces bka' stsal pa ste gsungs pa dang ngo //
translated: all of it, he spoke thus.

original: gal te 'phags pa rab 'byor la sogs pa gzhan dag gis kyang cung zad smras pa yod mod kyi de ni bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag po nyid las yin pas nyes pa med do //
analyzed: gal te 'phags pa rab 'byor la sogs pa gzhan dag gis kyang cung zad smras pa yod mod kyi de ni bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag po nyid las yin pas nyes pa med do //
translated: Although others, such as Subhuti, the noble one, also spoke a little, that was due to the Lord's power, so there is no fault.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa byams pa la sogs pa de dag kyang dga' zhing bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do zhes 'brel te rnam bar dbye ba sgyur nas 'brel pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa byams pa la sogs pa de dag kyang dga' zhing bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do zhes 'brel te rnam bar dbye ba sgyur nas 'brel pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And those Bodhisattva-Mahasattvas, the noble Maitreya and so forth, were delighted and praised what the Lord said. The connection is made by changing the case endings.

original: dang zhes bya ba ni thams cad du 'og ma 'og ma la ltos te bsdu ba'i don yin te /
analyzed: dang zhes bya ba ni thams cad du 'og ma 'og ma la ltos te bsdu ba'i don yin te /
translated: And means that in all cases it has the sense of including the preceding.

original: de bzhin du 'phags pa rab 'byor yang dga' zhing gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do zhes 'brel te brjod pa yongs su gyur pa dang 'brel ba'i phyir ro //🔽de @340a * //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'phags pa rab 'byor yang dga' zhing gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do zhes 'brel te brjod pa yongs su gyur pa dang 'brel ba'i phyir ro // de @340a * //
translated: And the noble Subhuti was delighted and praised what was said. The connection is made by changing the verbal expression.

original: bzhin du 'phags pa sh'a ri'i bu la sogs pa la ltos te re re zhing sbyar ro //
analyzed: bzhin du 'phags pa sh'a ri'i bu la sogs pa la ltos te re re zhing sbyar ro //
translated: Thus, in relation to the noble Shariputra and so forth, each is to be connected.

original: lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa dang lhan cig gnas pa yin pas na lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten zhes bya'o //
analyzed: lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa dang lhan cig gnas pa yin pas na lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten zhes bya'o //
translated: asuras, and gandharvas is the world with its gods, humans, asuras, and gandharvas.

original: de dang tha dad pa gzhan su zhig yod ce na de rnams dang bcas pa zhes brjod cing /
analyzed: de dang tha dad pa gzhan su zhig yod ce na de rnams dang bcas pa zhes brjod cing /
translated: What other than that is there?

original: tshogs pa dang tshogs pa can gyi dbye ba la ltos nas de skad brjod pas nyes pa med do //
analyzed: tshogs pa dang tshogs pa can gyi dbye ba la ltos nas de skad brjod pas nyes pa med do //
translated: The phrase “along with” is used in the sense of a collection and that which is collected.

original: yang na mi'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang nam mkha' lding la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang mang po yod pas de ltar brtsad par mi bya'o //
analyzed: yang na mi'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang nam mkha' lding la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang mang po yod pas de ltar brtsad par mi bya'o //
translated: Or else, there are many other beings, such as kinnaras, mahoragas, garuḍas, and so on.

original: 'di dag thams cad kyis kyang dam pa'i chos mnyan pa las gzhan rang dang gzhan la ches mchog tu phan pa yod par nye bar ma dmigs te /
analyzed: 'di dag thams cad kyis kyang dam pa'i chos mnyan pa las gzhan rang dang gzhan la ches mchog tu phan pa yod par nye bar ma dmigs te /
translated: None of these are as beneficial to oneself and others as listening to the true Dharma.

original: de bas na rab tu dga' ba'i rgyu yod pas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la rab tu dga' ba phul du byung ba yang dag par skyed de bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbang phyug dam pa thugs rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyi sku can khyod kyis legs
analyzed: de bas na rab tu dga' ba'i rgyu yod pas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la rab tu dga' ba phul du byung ba yang dag par skyed de bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbang phyug dam pa thugs rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyi sku can khyod kyis legs
translated: Therefore, since the cause of joy exists, the Buddha's statements give rise to the highest joy.🔽🔽O Bhagavān, you who have a body of the nature of great compassion, supreme lord of Dharma, you are excellent.

original: par gsungs pa'i gsungs 'di ni legs so zhes bya ba la sogs pas mngon par bstod do zhes bya ba bstod par gyur to zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: par gsungs pa'i gsungs 'di ni legs so zhes bya ba la sogs pas mngon par bstod do zhes bya ba bstod par gyur to zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Therefore, since the cause of supreme joy exists, the Bhagavat's speech generates the supreme joy of supreme joy. The Bhagavat, who has a body whose nature is the supreme lord of phenomena, great compassion, is praised with Excellent! and so on. The meaning of became is that he became praise.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bshad pa mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi snang ba las yongs su gtad pa'i le'u zhes bya ste sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bshad pa mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi snang ba las yongs su gtad pa'i le'u zhes bya ste sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o /
translated: This completes the chapter on entrusting, the thirty-second chapter of the treatise Illuminating the Ornament of Clear Realization, An Explanation of the Perfection of Wisdom.

original: // / mdor bsdus la sogs tshig brjod la mkhas gsung rab kun la mnga' mdzad pa //
analyzed: // / mdor bsdus la sogs tshig brjod la mkhas gsung rab kun la mnga' mdzad pa //
translated: Skilled in concise and other expressions, mastering all scriptures,

original: 'dren byed rnams kyi rtogs don de nyid lam kun gang phyir de lta bur //
analyzed: 'dren byed rnams kyi rtogs don de nyid lam kun gang phyir de lta bur //
translated: The meaning of the realizations of the guides is thus the path of all,

original: gsal bar mdzad pa de nyid las ni shes rab pha rol phyin pa yin pa'i //
analyzed: gsal bar mdzad pa de nyid las ni shes rab pha rol phyin pa yin pa'i //
translated: And it is from him that the perfection of wisdom has been made clear.

original: tshul la khyad par shes bya 'di ni gsung gi bdag nyid tsam du zad //
analyzed: tshul la khyad par shes bya 'di ni gsung gi bdag nyid tsam du zad //
translated: This is the difference in method, and it is merely a matter of the nature of his speech.🔽By the power of the noble Asanga, of the good and generous ones who follow his texts,

original: 'phags pa thogs med gzhung gi rjes 'brangs blo bzang ser sna med rnams dang // mkhyen ldan mang du gsan pa dang ldan bla ma rnam par snang mdzad bzang po yi //
analyzed: 'phags pa thogs med gzhung gi rjes 'brangs blo bzang ser sna med rnams dang // mkhyen ldan mang du gsan pa dang ldan bla ma rnam par snang mdzad bzang po yi //
translated: And of the learned and well-versed guru Vairocanabhadra,

original: mthu yis blo gsal cung zhig skyes pas seng ge bzang po zhes bya bas //
analyzed: mthu yis blo gsal cung zhig skyes pas seng ge bzang po zhes bya bas //
translated: A little clarity has arisen in me, and so I, Siṃha bhadras,

original: 'phags pa bcom ldan 'das yum 'di yi don gsal rnam pa kun tu gus pas byas //
analyzed: 'phags pa bcom ldan 'das yum 'di yi don gsal rnam pa kun tu gus pas byas //
translated: Have respectfully and in every way clarified the meaning of this noble Mother of the Bhagavān.

original: yang dag yang dag ma yin rnam dbye'i rigs bral shes pa skyes las kun rdzob tu //
analyzed: yang dag yang dag ma yin rnam dbye'i rigs bral shes pa skyes las kun rdzob tu //
translated: From the arising of a cognition that is free from the discrimination of what is real and what is not real,

original: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i 'dam du yid bying skye bzhir 'gyur ba'i lus can 'di dag kun //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i 'dam du yid bying skye bzhir 'gyur ba'i lus can 'di dag kun //
translated: All these embodied beings, whose minds are sunk in the mire of the ocean of saṃsāra, are born four times.🔽From the root of virtue that I have obtained

original: @340b yum gyi bshad sbyar byas pa las byung bdag gis thob pa'i dge ba'i sa bon las //
analyzed: @340b yum gyi bshad sbyar byas pa las byung bdag gis thob pa'i dge ba'i sa bon las //
translated: From composing this commentary on the Mother,

original: rnam pa kun gyi mchog tu gyur pa'i sku ni gsum po nges par thob par shog / rdzogs sangs sras bcas rnams kyis legs par rnam phye yum 'di'ang gang na bzhugs gyur la //
analyzed: rnam pa kun gyi mchog tu gyur pa'i sku ni gsum po nges par thob par shog / rdzogs sangs sras bcas rnams kyis legs par rnam phye yum 'di'ang gang na bzhugs gyur la //
translated: May I attain the body that is supreme in every way.

original: blo nor phun tshogs yul min de bzhin tshig gi spyod yul min bdag gang na ste //
analyzed: blo nor phun tshogs yul min de bzhin tshig gi spyod yul min bdag gang na ste //
translated: This mother of the Victorious Ones, so well explained by the perfect Buddhas and their heirs, is not an object of the intellect, nor is it within the scope of words.🔽I pray that in all my future lives, I may never be confused about this.

original: bdag ni phyi nas skye ba gzhan du rtag tu rmongs pa nyid du ma gyur cig / snyam du bsams nas 'di byas pa las mkhas rnams kyis ni dpyad par rigs pa yin //
analyzed: bdag ni phyi nas skye ba gzhan du rtag tu rmongs pa nyid du ma gyur cig / snyam du bsams nas 'di byas pa las mkhas rnams kyis ni dpyad par rigs pa yin //
translated: Having thought this, I have composed this text. May the wise examine it and do what is right.

original: phrag dog zug rdus gdungs pa'i yid can log pa'i nga rgyal stabs bsgrubs thos pa yis //
analyzed: phrag dog zug rdus gdungs pa'i yid can log pa'i nga rgyal stabs bsgrubs thos pa yis //
translated: Those whose minds are tormented by the pain of jealousy, who are arrogant and deceitful, and who are ignorant,

original: shes rab ldan pa rnams kyi mdun du bshad par byed pa'i nus pa yod min te //
analyzed: shes rab ldan pa rnams kyi mdun du bshad par byed pa'i nus pa yod min te //
translated: are not able to explain this in the presence of the wise.

original: dam min skye bo rnams dang dam ba'i bar ni sa 'og dang ni mkha' ltar ring //
analyzed: dam min skye bo rnams dang dam ba'i bar ni sa 'og dang ni mkha' ltar ring //
translated: The distance between the wicked and the righteous is like the distance between the earth and the sky.

original: de nyid phyir na rnam pa de 'dras bdag la gnod 'gyur phra mo 'ga' yang med //
analyzed: de nyid phyir na rnam pa de 'dras bdag la gnod 'gyur phra mo 'ga' yang med //
translated: Therefore, I have no fear of any slight harm of that kind.

original: gang zhig sa stengs bsod nams grangs tshogs ldan par rab grags mkhas pa'i skye bos brgyan //
analyzed: gang zhig sa stengs bsod nams grangs tshogs ldan par rab grags mkhas pa'i skye bos brgyan //
translated: The earth is adorned with learned people who are renowned for their great accumulation of merit.

original: yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas dpal ldan t'i ka du ka'i gtsug lag khang bzangs der //
analyzed: yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas dpal ldan t'i ka du ka'i gtsug lag khang bzangs der //
translated: In the glorious monastery of Vikramaśīla, the source of all good qualities,

original: sbyin las 'byor pa chen po thob 'gyur chos kyi bdag nyid snying rje lha yi ni ;
analyzed: sbyin las 'byor pa chen po thob 'gyur chos kyi bdag nyid snying rje lha yi ni ;
translated: the lord of the Dharma, the compassionate one, the protector of the gods,

original: / mgon bcas bde ba'i rkyen gzhi mkhas pa'i gnas gyur khang pa dag tu gnas bcas nas //
analyzed: / mgon bcas bde ba'i rkyen gzhi mkhas pa'i gnas gyur khang pa dag tu gnas bcas nas //
translated: having established himself in a house that is the basis for the conditions of happiness,

original: glang chen khros pa'i klad pa rnam par 'gems byed nus pa dang ldan bdag nyid can //
analyzed: glang chen khros pa'i klad pa rnam par 'gems byed nus pa dang ldan bdag nyid can //
translated: he, who is able to crush the head of an angry elephant,

original: bsod nams la sbyangs brtson pa las byung phun tshogs rnams ni kun tu sbyor gyur pa //
analyzed: bsod nams la sbyangs brtson pa las byung phun tshogs rnams ni kun tu sbyor gyur pa //
translated: having become endowed with the perfection that arises from striving in the practice of merit,🔽during the reign of the glorious Dharma king of the Kṣatriya caste,

original: rgyal po mchog brgyud pa rgyud rgyal rigs nas 'khrungs rgyal po dpal ldan chos skyong ring la ni //
analyzed: rgyal po mchog brgyud pa rgyud rgyal rigs nas 'khrungs rgyal po dpal ldan chos skyong ring la ni //
translated: the best of kings,

original: dka' 'grel bzang po de nyid snang ba zhes bya 'di ni bdag gis rnam par brtsams //
analyzed: dka' 'grel bzang po de nyid snang ba zhes bya 'di ni bdag gis rnam par brtsams //
translated: This commentary on the difficult points called Illuminating the Meaning was composed by me.

original: mngon rtogs kyi ni rgyan gang yin //
analyzed: mngon rtogs kyi ni rgyan gang yin //
translated: What is the Ornament of Clear Realization?

original: de gsal byed pa'i snang ba ni //
analyzed: de gsal byed pa'i snang ba ni //
translated: The illumination that clarifies that🔽is the perfection of wisdom.

original: shes rab pha rol phyin rnams bshad dge 'byung de ni rdzogs pa yin //
analyzed: shes rab pha rol phyin rnams bshad dge 'byung de ni rdzogs pa yin //
translated: The arising of virtue is its completion.

original: mkhas pa mkhas pa ma yin rnams //
analyzed: mkhas pa mkhas pa ma yin rnams //
translated: The wise and the unwise

original: lhag chad dogs pa yod gyur na //
analyzed: lhag chad dogs pa yod gyur na //
translated: have doubts about additions and omissions.

original: gzhung 'di'i tshad kyi nges pa ni //
analyzed: gzhung 'di'i tshad kyi nges pa ni //
translated: The measure of this text

original: yum 'di yi ni mtshan nyid yin //🔽'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bshad pa mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi de kho na nyid @341a * //
analyzed: yum 'di yi ni mtshan nyid yin // 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bshad pa mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi de kho na nyid @341a * //
translated: is the characteristic of this mother.🔽The explanation of the noble perfection of wisdom, the reality

original: snang ba zhes bya ba /
analyzed: snang ba zhes bya ba /
translated: of the Ornament of Clear Realization, called Illuminating the Meaning,

original: mkhas pa chen po slob dpon seng ge bzang po'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: mkhas pa chen po slob dpon seng ge bzang po'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: is completed.

original: // / sngon gyi smon lam bsod nams tshogs bsags rgyus //
analyzed: // / sngon gyi smon lam bsod nams tshogs bsags rgyus //
translated: By the cause of accumulating the merit of previous aspirations,

original: lha rigs byang chub sems dpa'i rgyud du grags //
analyzed: lha rigs byang chub sems dpa'i rgyud du grags //
translated: in the lineage of a celestial bodhisattva, it is renowned.

original: sa stengs rgyal po'i rgyal po nyid gyur ba //
analyzed: sa stengs rgyal po'i rgyal po nyid gyur ba //
translated: He became the king of kings on the face of the earth.

original: dpal gyis brgyan cing skyon med gnas su 'khrungs //
analyzed: dpal gyis brgyan cing skyon med gnas su 'khrungs //
translated: He was born in a faultless place, adorned with glory.

original: gnag dag grags pa zla zer lta bu yis //
analyzed: gnag dag grags pa zla zer lta bu yis //
translated: With the moonlight of his pure fame,

original: sa stengs kun tu rnam par mdzes gyur cing //
analyzed: sa stengs kun tu rnam par mdzes gyur cing //
translated: he beautified the face of the earth.

original: mdzad spyod phun sum tshogs yon tan kun gyis brgyan //
analyzed: mdzad spyod phun sum tshogs yon tan kun gyis brgyan //
translated: His conduct was perfect, and he was adorned with all good qualities.

original: mi dbang sa yi bdag po lha lder grags //
analyzed: mi dbang sa yi bdag po lha lder grags //
translated: The lord of men, the king of the land, was known as Lhade.

original: skyes chen des ni bod khams 'gro ba kun //
analyzed: skyes chen des ni bod khams 'gro ba kun //
translated: That great being, for the sake of all the beings of Tibet,

original: sangs rgyas 'bras thob par gyi phan bzhed de //
analyzed: sangs rgyas 'bras thob par gyi phan bzhed de //
translated: wished to bring them to the fruition of Buddhahood.

original: rgyal yum don gsal bya phyir rab 'bad pas //
analyzed: rgyal yum don gsal bya phyir rab 'bad pas //
translated: In order to clarify the meaning of the Mother of the Victorious Ones, he exerted himself

original: yongs snyoms chos kyi sbyin bdag chen po mdzad //
analyzed: yongs snyoms chos kyi sbyin bdag chen po mdzad //
translated: and became a great impartial benefactor of the Dharma.

original: don 'di sgrub phyir dga' bas thag rings nas //
analyzed: don 'di sgrub phyir dga' bas thag rings nas //
translated: For the sake of accomplishing this meaning, with joy from afar

original: gsol btab rgyu yis rgyal po'i rigs su grags //
analyzed: gsol btab rgyu yis rgyal po'i rigs su grags //
translated: he supplicated, and through the cause he became known as a king.

original: dga' byed rgyud byung legs bshad dpal zhes bya'i //
analyzed: dga' byed rgyud byung legs bshad dpal zhes bya'i //
translated: I, Nandagarbha, who has arisen from the lineage of Nandagarbha,

original: thos mangs mkhas pa'i grags thob bdag gis bshad //
analyzed: thos mangs mkhas pa'i grags thob bdag gis bshad //
translated: who has attained the fame of being learned through much study, will explain🔽the glorious one called Legs bshad,

original: sgra skad tha snyad la byang brtson par ldan //
analyzed: sgra skad tha snyad la byang brtson par ldan //
translated: which is skilled in the conventions of language.

original: rin chen sgron 'dra'i rin chen bzang po yis //
analyzed: rin chen sgron 'dra'i rin chen bzang po yis //
translated: The precious one, good like a precious lamp,

original: gtsang dge yon tan du ma'i byung gnas gyur /
analyzed: gtsang dge yon tan du ma'i byung gnas gyur /
translated: Has become the source of many qualities of purity and virtue.

original: rgyal sa'i dam pa bu rangs gnas su bsgyur //
analyzed: rgyal sa'i dam pa bu rangs gnas su bsgyur //
translated: He has transformed the holy capital into the land of the Buddha.

original: snying rjes gzhan la phan pa gtsor byas te //
analyzed: snying rjes gzhan la phan pa gtsor byas te //
translated: Out of compassion, he has made the benefit of others his priority.

original: rtogs sla thun mong rang skad byas pa las //
analyzed: rtogs sla thun mong rang skad byas pa las //
translated: This has been written in a common language, easy to understand.

original: bsod nams rgya chen 'dir ni gang bsags des //
analyzed: bsod nams rgya chen 'dir ni gang bsags des //
translated: By the great merit accumulated here,🔽May all the worlds attain supreme enlightenment.

original: 'jig rten mtha' dag byang chub mchog thob shog / dbang phyug dam pa'i mnga' bdag bod kyi lha btsan po khri bkra shis lde btsan gyi bkas /
analyzed: 'jig rten mtha' dag byang chub mchog thob shog / dbang phyug dam pa'i mnga' bdag bod kyi lha btsan po khri bkra shis lde btsan gyi bkas /
translated: By the order of the sovereign lord, the divine Tibetan king Trisong Detsen,

original: rgya gar gyi mkhan po su bh'a shi ta dang / sgra bsgyur byi lo ts'a ba chen po / dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur nas /
analyzed: rgya gar gyi mkhan po su bh'a shi ta dang / sgra bsgyur byi lo ts'a ba chen po / dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur nas /
translated: The Indian abbot Subhasita and the great translator, the monk Rinchen Zangpo, translated this.

original: slad kyi rgya gar gyi mkhan po pandi ta chen po d'i pi ka ra shr'i dzny'a na dang / zhu zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba chen po dge slong rin chen bzang pos yul dbus kyi dpe dang yang gtugs nas bcos shing zhus te gtan la phab pa las /
analyzed: slad kyi rgya gar gyi mkhan po pandi ta chen po d'i pi ka ra shr'i dzny'a na dang / zhu zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba chen po dge slong rin chen bzang pos yul dbus kyi dpe dang yang gtugs nas bcos shing zhus te gtan la phab pa las /
translated: Later, the great Indian abbot and pandit Dipamkarasrijnana and the great Tibetan translator, the monk Rinchen Zangpo, compared it with the central Indian text and revised and finalized it.

original: de nas dus phis pandi ta chen po gzhung 'bum phrag gnyis kyis mgrin pa brgyan pa dhi ra p'a la zhes bya ba dang / lo ts'a ba dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyi legs par bsgyur zhing bcos pa'o /
analyzed: de nas dus phis pandi ta chen po gzhung 'bum phrag gnyis kyis mgrin pa brgyan pa dhi ra p'a la zhes bya ba dang / lo ts'a ba dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyi legs par bsgyur zhing bcos pa'o /
translated: Later still, the great pandit Dharmapala, whose neck was adorned with two hundred thousand scriptures, and the translator, the monk Lodan Sherab, revised and finalized it well.
